body:
very very good advice!  thanks for a lot!

and as our champion said,  please use english describe the issue!   thanks again!
t_ds sounds good , d means  dolphin  and s means scheduler

> > The above is just thought of the situation that the individual is currently using. There must be some omissions. Perhaps the official team in these places has already considered it. I hope that after the name change, I can try to upgrade as easily as I can now.
> 
> All these discussions are very project related, please move to dev@ mail list.
> 
> > Thank you for the contribution of the Dolphinscheduler team, I wish Dolphinscheduler to become an official Apache project soon!
> 
> It is an official Apache incubator project, just not a top level project. It will be a long journey for the whole community.

where is dev@mail list?

This interface is the startup process instance interface, just insert a command into the Command table, indicating that the startup is successful. Not the process execution was successful. Process execution successfully monitors process status

这个接口是启动流程实例接口，只是将插入到Command表中一条命令，说明启动成功了。不是流程执行成功了。流程执行成功得监控流程状态
you can send email to `dev-subscribe@dolphinscheduler.apache.org ` to subscribe the development information about dolphinscheduler!
good feature!
we will consider it later! thanks for a lot!
please describe or translate this issue in English, thanks!

#776    
@lgcareer  when update easyscheduler(include table name) to dolphinscheduelr,  please consider `backward compatibility ` and this advice, thanks!

We have included this feature in our project requirements confirmation, and we hope that the brother contribution code will implement this feature.

我们已经将此功能列入我们的项目需求确认中，也希望兄弟贡献代码实现此功能

We will reconsider this issue, and of course we hope that the brothers will submit the pr solution.

我们将会重新考虑这个问题，当然也希望兄弟提交pr解决

Is it the scheduling that is deployed under the docker?
If this is the problem, first locate it to see if the table in the database is enough. Is it 38 tables?
About timing:
First, the process definition can only be in the online state to set a timing.
Secondly, if the t_escheduler_scheduler table is not associated with the current process definition, it will not be displayed.
If I still can't solve your problem, you can take a screenshot to illustrate the situation.


是在群里提的哪个docker下部署的调度吗？
如果是这个问题，先定位一下看看数据库中的表是不是够，是38张表吗？
关于定时：
首先流程定义只能是处于上线状态才能设置一个定时
其次如果t_escheduler_scheduler表如果和当前的流程定义关联不起来也显示不出来
如果我说的还是不能解决你的问题，可以截图说明情况

这个功能是属于Devops的范畴，不过确实是需要支持的。

抽取关系型数据库中的数据到离线hive数仓是需要的，目前这块做的比较好的Datax组件我觉得我们需要做支撑。 我们可以增加一种新的任务类型，从而根据用户的场景更好的做支撑。

It is necessary to extract the data from the relational database to the offline hive data warehouse. At present, the Datax component is well done, and I think we need to support it.

+1

datax has so many dependencies, datax maybe supported through task plugin, we will implement task plugin feature later!

So how I can know which processInstance is what I just run？ because there may be more than one 
processInstance running at the same time in a same processDef.

那我怎么知道哪个运行的任务实例才是我刚才执行的呢。因为同一个任务同一时间可能有多个正在运行的实例

需求：A执行完后，执行B，如果要将A的参数传给B。
方案：A执行完后，需要传递保存到运行参数表中，B在执行之前，从运行参数表中取到参数，通过context传给B
需求是无尽的，每个公司都有自己的业务，有不同的组件，dolphinsheduler 应该提供一种插件扩展机制，让用户能自己编写、上传插件。dolphinsheduler 框架只要做好对插件的生命周期管理即可。比如：启动任务、停止任务等等。

远程执行会有N个问题
1.ssh远程登录后执行，属于非交互式登录，环境变量可能无法加载
2.脚本执行后，无法获取它的执行状态和日志

1、类似的secureCRT软件也是远程登录执行命令的，可以是交互模式的
2、开源库libssh2里面可以拿到执行的结果的

thank you！

good idea!

最简单的办法：
1.限制老版本的worker，不能再分配到任务
2.在worker所在机器，用新版本启动一个新进程
3.老版本的worker,任务运行完后自己退出
我们的DAG调度系统传参也是通过保存到context的方式，所有后面的节点可以依赖引用所有前面节点的输出
Please visit this address https://github.com/apache/incubator-dolphinscheduler/releases，Future Apache version, apache will give us the warehouse

Resource Center, does the resource list have content? Is to match the list of resources and resources you bind.
Or can you take a screenshot? Better we locate the problem

资源中心，资源列表有内容吗？是将你绑定的资源和资源列表进行匹配的
或者可以截图吗？更好我们定位出来问题

Sorry, this is not only to remove the mysql CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, but also the default value of the program that needs to set the time, can not take the default value of the data.

不好意思，这个不单单是要把mysql的CURRENT_TIMESTAMP去掉，还有程序中的涉及到的需要设置时间的默认值，不能走数据的默认值了
good job！
good issue，please add english description！title also need to add english，this will help more people not familiar with chinese，thank you！

1. Please confirm whether port **8181** in **application. properties** is occupied. If not, see point 2.
2. Make sure that the ports mapped to the scheduling system are occupied in the **nginx configuration file**, as shown in the following figure:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18095523/65129910-dfd2dd80-da2e-11e9-9b65-12d7bdf1c79d.png)
If the error is still reported, please provide more error information.

> 疑问：是不是需要与大数据集群部署在一块？还是要独立部署？

如果你用jdbc执行hive sql，啥也不需要。
如果你用hive的客户端来执行hive sql，在hive所在机器，安装worker就ok了。

add properties worker_logback.xml >logBase
```xml
 <filter class="cn.escheduler.server.worker.log.TaskLogFilter"></filter>
        <Discriminator class="cn.escheduler.server.worker.log.TaskLogDiscriminator">
            <key>taskAppId</key>
            <logBase>${log.base}</logBase>
        </Discriminator>
```

> 节点重复计算，会耗费多余的资源与时间，如果业务允许的话，可以进行逻辑拆分，如节点A进行数据落地，其他工作流中的节点直接读取， 仍然存在重复读取，但是避免了重复计算

那相当于节点a的下游节点必须在一个工作流中，可以这么理解吗？
节点a下有20个节点，这20个节点又各有自己的子节点，那不就节点膨胀，DAG图变得庞大无比，给运维和可视来说，都造成巨大的障碍
对是这个样子，从我理解来看，不同的工作流 节点执行时间节点也不同，节点执行 状态复用  时间界限也不好界定，或许 从多个维度去实现一个 执行策略 会好一些

> ui端口占用可以在启动的时候指定端口
> 后端服务端口专业可以在conf下配置对应服务，server.port = 8081

ui端 nginx已重新设置端口，且可以正常启动
后端在conf下重新设置端口server.port = 7171，
但是问题在于 一个节点的master服务启动完后 半分钟就自动挂，日志显示8080端口被占用。
监控中心master只显示一台，我配了两台
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54257101/65294756-c302eb00-db91-11e9-983e-384275b02604.png)

这个问题已经解决。

I fix this bug.
https://github.com/apache/incubator-dolphinscheduler/pull/824

you can modify worker_logback.xml
```

<root level="INFO">
       <appender-ref ref="STDOUT"/> <!-- add this  -->
        <appender-ref ref="TASKLOGFILE"/>
        <appender-ref ref="WORKERLOGFILE"/>
    </root>
```

and check appender name is TASKLOGFILE. 
```
 <Discriminator class="cn.escheduler.server.worker.log.TaskLogDiscriminator">
            <key>taskAppId</key>
            <logBase>${log.base}</logBase> <!-- required -->
        </Discriminator>
```

check your master.properties  and worker.properties
master.reserved.memory =physical memory * 1/10

```
# master execute thread num
master.exec.threads=100

# master execute task number in parallel
master.exec.task.number=20

# master heartbeat interval
master.heartbeat.interval=10

# master commit task retry times
master.task.commit.retryTimes=5

# master commit task interval
master.task.commit.interval=100


# only less than cpu avg load, master server can work. default value : the number of cpu cores * 2
master.max.cpuload.avg=10

# only larger than reserved memory, master server can work. default value : physical memory * 1/10, unit is G.
master.reserved.memory=1  
```

please add description(title) in english! thank you!

class cn.escheduler.server.worker.runner.TaskScheduleThread 
have a method name getTaskLogPath.
```java   
 private String getTaskLogPath() {
        String baseLog = ((TaskLogDiscriminator) ((SiftingAppender) ((LoggerContext) LoggerFactory.getILoggerFactory())
                .getLogger("ROOT")
                .getAppender("TASKLOGFILE"))
                .getDiscriminator()).getLogBase();   //this line cannot get  
        if (baseLog.startsWith(Constants.SINGLE_SLASH)){
            return baseLog + Constants.SINGLE_SLASH +
                    taskInstance.getProcessDefinitionId() + Constants.SINGLE_SLASH  +
                    taskInstance.getProcessInstanceId() + Constants.SINGLE_SLASH  +
                    taskInstance.getId() + ".log";
        }
        return System.getProperty("user.dir") + Constants.SINGLE_SLASH +
                baseLog +  Constants.SINGLE_SLASH +
                taskInstance.getProcessDefinitionId() + Constants.SINGLE_SLASH  +
                taskInstance.getProcessInstanceId() + Constants.SINGLE_SLASH  +
                taskInstance.getId() + ".log";
    }
```

As long as the free memory is larger than the reserved memory. It will run normally.

如何同时提交多个PR，我是在IDEA操作的
1、选中upstream/dev点击Checkout AS...
2、命名为你当次提交PR的功能名称，例如我的是添加http组件：dev-add-http-components
3、然后有两种场景：
一、你在当前分支开发代码：
（1）开发完代码，然后Commit and Push，值得注意的是：Push的时候需要改提交的分支为origin/dev-add-http-components
（2）最后在github页面，点击New pull request，选择修改完的本地分支和要合并过去的分支，Create pull request，就完成提交 PR了。

二、你在其他分支开发完代码：
（1）打开Version Control - Log ，选择其它分支提交的代码记录，点击Cherry-Pick,更新到本地，然后Commit and Push，值得注意的是：Push的时候需要改提交的分支为origin/dev-add-http-components
（2）最后在github页面，点击New pull request，选择修改完的本地分支和要合并过去的分支，Create pull request，就完成提交 PR了。
